title: Champion Rap?
body:
So I was thinking this morning about how we have a lot of champions in League of Legends, only about 40 off of how many we had in Gen 1 Pokemon.

And I found myself wondering, has anyone created a Champion Rap yet? In similar style of the Pokemon Rap of course.

replies.body: Who ever doesn't know about the pokerap.... I feel bad about your childhood.
Idk what Pokemon raps are, but you can try listening to badministrator, his raps are awesome.
You've never heard of the Pokemon Rap? From Season One of Pokemon?

> You've never heard of the Pokemon Rap? From Season One of Pokemon?

Well if he knew what they were, I highly doubt he would have asked what they were.. like lmao.

Close kinda.
This is War series is pretty good, best was the Piltover one though.
